node.data: {"Home":"Ile","Contact":"Olubasọrọ","View All Services":"Wo Gbogbo Awọn iṣẹ","Innovating African businesses":"Innovating African iṣowo","We are a Software Development Company, primarily focused on Frontend Web Development.":"A jẹ Ile-iṣẹ Idagbasoke sọfitiwia, ni akọkọ ti dojukọ lori Idagbasoke Oju opo wẹẹbu Frontend.","Phone 1":"Foonu 1","Phone 2":"Foonu 2","Email":"Imeeli","About":"Nipa","Pricing":"Ifowoleri","Team":"Egbe","Services":"Awọn iṣẹ","Who we are":"Tani awa","Pricing built for businesses of all sizes":"Ifowoleri ti a ṣe fun awọn iṣowo ti gbogbo titobi","Our team of Engineers":"Ẹgbẹ wa ti Enginners","ABOUT":"NIPA","PRICING":"Ifowoleri","TEAM":"EGBE","Our Services":"Awọn iṣẹ wa","Artificial Intelligence":"Oye atọwọda","Data Science":"Data Imọ","Machine Learning":"Ẹkọ ẹrọ","Mobile Development":"Mobile Development","Web Design/Development":"Web Design / idagbasoke","Our team of engineers deeply explore data and ways to record, store and analyze data to extract useful information and our end goal is to…":"Ẹgbẹ wa ti awọn onimọ-ẹrọ jinna ṣawari data ati awọn ọna lati gbasilẹ, fipamọ ati itupalẹ data lati jade alaye to wulo ati ibi-afẹde opin wa ni lati…","Here at Team ML we focus on making use of AI algorithms by providing sytems the ability to automatically learn and in improve from…":"Nibi ni Ẹgbẹ ML a dojukọ lori lilo awọn algoridimu AI nipa fifun awọn eto ni agbara lati kọ ẹkọ laifọwọyi ati ni ilọsiwaju lati…","For mobile development we utilise (React Native) which is a Mobile App Development Framework that enables the development of multi-platform…":"Fun idagbasoke alagbeka a lo (React Native) eyiti o jẹ Ilana Idagbasoke Ohun elo Alagbeka ti o fun laaye idagbasoke ti ọpọlọpọ-Syeed…","We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile…":"A ṣẹda awọn oju opo wẹẹbu ati awọn ohun elo wẹẹbu ti didara giga ti o ṣe idahun gaan ati ore olumulo ni lilo ọkan ninu alagbeka ti o dara julọ ati iyara julọ…","Our AI Team focuses on writing algorithms and leveraging on existing one to maximise human efficiency in business and home at large":"Ẹgbẹ AI wa dojukọ lori kikọ awọn algoridimu ati lilo lori ọkan ti o wa tẹlẹ lati mu iṣẹ ṣiṣe eniyan pọ si ni iṣowo ati ile ni gbogbogbo","Our team of engineers deeply explore data and ways to record, store and analyze data to extract useful information and our end goal is to gain insights and knowledge from any type of data both structured and unstructured":"Ẹgbẹ wa ti awọn onimọ-ẹrọ jinlẹ ṣawari data ati awọn ọna lati gbasilẹ, tọju ati itupalẹ data lati jade alaye ti o wulo ati ibi-afẹde opin wa ni lati ni oye ati oye lati eyikeyi iru data mejeeji ti iṣeto ati ti a ko ṣeto","Here at Team ML we focus on making use of AI algorithms by providing sytems the ability to automatically learn and in improve from experience without being explicitly programmed, we also focus on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it to learn for themselves":"Nibi ni Team ML a dojukọ lori ṣiṣe lilo awọn algorithms AI nipa fifun awọn ilana ni agbara lati kọ ẹkọ laifọwọyi ati ni ilọsiwaju lati iriri laisi eto ni gbangba, a tun dojukọ idagbasoke awọn eto kọnputa ti o le wọle si data ati lo lati kọ ẹkọ fun ara wọn.","For mobile development we utilise (React Native) which is a Mobile App Development Framework that enables the development of multi-platform Android and iOS apps using native UI elements":"Fun idagbasoke alagbeka a lo (Ibilẹ React) eyiti o jẹ Ilana Idagbasoke Ohun elo Alagbeka ti o fun laaye idagbasoke ti ọpọlọpọ-Syeed Android ati awọn ohun elo iOS nipa lilo awọn eroja UI abinibi","We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile technologies, React Native MERN stack(MongoDB, Express, React and Node), Gatsby and Vite which is utilised in most upcoming industries":"A ṣẹda awọn oju opo wẹẹbu ati awọn ohun elo wẹẹbu ti didara giga ti o ṣe idahun gaan ati ore olumulo ni lilo ọkan ninu awọn imọ-ẹrọ alagbeka ti o dara julọ ati iyara, React Native MERN akopọ (MongoDB, Express, React ati Node), Gatsby ati Vite eyiti o lo ni awọn ile-iṣẹ ti n bọ pupọ julọ.","Your vision is built with":"Rẹ iran ti wa ni itumọ ti pẹlu","GATSBY":"GATSBY","Gatsby.js, a popular open-source framework for building modern web applications. Gatsby.js is based on React and uses GraphQL to pull data from various sources to generate static websites":"Gatsby.js, ilana orisun ṣiṣi olokiki fun kikọ awọn ohun elo wẹẹbu ode oni. ","NEST":"itẹ-ẹiyẹ","NestJS is a framework for building scalable and efficient server-side applications. It is often used to develop web applications, APIs, and microservices using TypeScript or JavaScript. NestJS is built with a modular and extensible architecture and draws inspiration from Angular, which makes it familiar to developers who have experience with Angular":"NestJS jẹ ilana fun kikọ ti iwọn ati awọn ohun elo ẹgbẹ olupin daradara. ","VITE":"VITE","Vite is a build tool and development server that is designed to optimize the development experience for modern web applications, particularly those using frameworks like React, Vue, and others. Vite is known for its fast startup time and efficient development workflow.":"Vite jẹ ohun elo kikọ ati olupin idagbasoke ti o jẹ apẹrẹ lati mu iriri idagbasoke pọ si fun awọn ohun elo wẹẹbu ode oni, pataki awọn ti nlo awọn ilana bii React, Vue, ati awọn miiran. ","REACT":"FÁÀNÍ","React, also known as React.js or ReactJS, is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It was developed by Facebook and is widely used for creating interactive and dynamic user interfaces in web applications. React allows developers to build reusable UI components, making it easier to manage and update complex user interfaces.":"React, ti a tun mọ ni React.js tabi ReactJS, jẹ orisun-ìmọ JavaScript ile-ikawe fun kikọ awọn atọkun olumulo tabi awọn paati UI. ","REACT NATIVE":"ONÍLÉ ÌDÁHÙN","React Native is an open-source framework developed by Facebook that allows developers to build mobile applications using JavaScript and React. With React Native, you can create cross-platform mobile apps that run on both iOS and Android platforms while sharing a significant portion of the codebase. This enables developers to use their web development skills to build native mobile applications.":"Native React jẹ ilana orisun-ìmọ ti o dagbasoke nipasẹ Facebook ti o fun laaye awọn olupilẹṣẹ lati kọ awọn ohun elo alagbeka nipa lilo JavaScript ati React. ","JAVASCRIPT":"JAVASCRIPT","JavaScript is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language primarily known for its role in web development. It is commonly used to add interactivity, dynamic content, and behavior to websites. JavaScript is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.":"JavaScript jẹ ipele giga, wapọ, ati ede siseto itumọ ni akọkọ ti a mọ fun ipa rẹ ninu idagbasoke wẹẹbu. ","HTML 5":"HTML 5","HTML5, the fifth and latest version of the Hypertext Markup Language, is a standard markup language for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. HTML5 was officially released as a W3C Recommendation in October 2014, and it brings several new features and improvements over its predecessor, HTML4.":"HTML5, ẹ̀yà karùn-ún àti àtúnyẹ̀wò ti Èdè Siṣamisi Hypertext, jẹ́ èdè dídárí-ńlá kan fún ìṣètò àti ìfihàn àkóónú lórí Wẹ́ẹ̀bù Àgbáyé. ","CSS 3":"CSS 3","CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in HTML or XML. CSS3 is the latest version of CSS, bringing new features, enhancements, and capabilities to the language. CSS3 builds upon the foundation of CSS2 and introduces several advanced styling options and techniques. ":"CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) jẹ ede dì ara ti a lo fun apejuwe iwo ati tito akoonu ti iwe ti a kọ ni HTML tabi XML.  ","GRAPHQL":"GRAPHQL","GraphQL is a query language and runtime for APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) that was developed by Facebook. It provides a more efficient, powerful, and flexible alternative to traditional REST APIs. GraphQL allows clients to request only the data they need and receive a predictable, structured response, making it well-suited for building modern web and mobile applications":"GraphQL jẹ ede ibeere ati asiko asiko fun awọn API (Awọn atọkun Eto Eto Ohun elo) ti Facebook ṣe idagbasoke. ","SASS":"SASS","Sass, which stands for Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). SassScript is the scripting language itself. It provides mechanisms such as variables, nested rules, and mixins, making CSS more maintainable and easier to write.":"Sass, eyi ti o duro fun Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, jẹ ede afọwọkọ iṣaaju ti o tumọ tabi ṣajọ sinu Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). ","R":"R","R is a programming language and free software environment specifically designed for statistical computing and graphics. It is widely used by statisticians, data scientists, researchers, and analysts for tasks such as data analysis, statistical modeling, visualization, and machine learning. R provides a comprehensive set of tools for working with data, and it has a large and active community that contributes to its packages and ecosystem.":"R jẹ ede siseto ati agbegbe sọfitiwia ọfẹ ti a ṣe apẹrẹ pataki fun iṣiro iṣiro ati awọn aworan. ","PYTHON":"PYTHON","Python is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language known for its readability and ease of use. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python has become one of the most popular programming languages, used in various domains such as web development, data science, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, automation, and more.":"Python jẹ ipele giga, wapọ, ati ede siseto itumọ ti a mọ fun kika ati irọrun lilo. ","MONGO DB":"MONGO DB","MongoDB is a cross-platform, document-oriented NoSQL (Not Only SQL) database program. It falls under the category of NoSQL databases because it does not use the traditional relational database management system (RDBMS) structure. Instead, MongoDB stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents known as BSON (Binary JSON) that can vary in structure, allowing for a dynamic and scalable approach to data storage.":"MongoDB jẹ ipilẹ-agbelebu, eto orisun data NoSQL (Kii ṣe SQL nikan). ","NODE JS":"NODE JS","Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that allows developers to execute server-side JavaScript code. It is built on the V8 JavaScript runtime engine, which is the same engine that powers the Google Chrome browser. Node.js enables the development of scalable and high-performance web applications by using an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model.":"Node.js jẹ orisun-ìmọ, agbelebu-Syeed JavaScript agbegbe asiko asiko ti o fun laaye awọn idagbasoke lati ṣiṣẹ koodu JavaScript ẹgbẹ olupin. ","ANGULAR":"ANGULAR","Angular is a popular open-source web application framework developed and maintained by Google. It is written in TypeScript and allows developers to build dynamic, single-page web applications (SPAs) with a focus on creating a modular and maintainable codebase. Angular provides a comprehensive set of features for building modern, client-side web applications.":"Angular jẹ ilana ohun elo wẹẹbu ṣiṣi-orisun olokiki ti o dagbasoke ati ṣetọju nipasẹ Google. ","NPM":"NPM","NPM stands for Node Package Manager, and it is the default package manager for Node.js, a JavaScript runtime environment. NPM is used to manage and distribute packages (libraries and tools) written in JavaScript and intended for use with Node.js.":"NPM duro fun Oluṣakoso Package Node, ati pe o jẹ oluṣakoso package aiyipada fun Node.js, agbegbe asiko asiko JavaScript kan. ","GITHUB":"GITHUB","GitHub is a web-based platform that provides a centralized repository hosting service for version control using Git. It is widely used by developers and teams to collaboratively work on software projects, track changes, and manage code repositories. GitHub offers a range of features to support collaboration, code review, issue tracking, and continuous integration.":"GitHub jẹ pẹpẹ ti o da lori wẹẹbu ti o pese iṣẹ alejo gbigba ibi-ipamọ aarin fun iṣakoso ẹya nipa lilo Git. ","FIGMA":"FIGMA","Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that enables collaborative interface design and user experience (UI/UX) prototyping. It is commonly used by designers, developers, and teams to create, share, and iterate on designs in real-time. Figma's key feature is its cloud-based platform, which allows multiple users to collaborate on design projects simultaneously, fostering a seamless and efficient design process.":"Figma jẹ apẹrẹ ti o da lori awọsanma ati ohun elo apẹrẹ ti o jẹ ki apẹrẹ wiwo ifowosowopo ati iriri olumulo (UI/UX) ṣiṣe adaṣe. ","ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR":"ADOBE ILUSTRATOR","Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Inc. It is part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite of design software, which also includes applications like Photoshop, InDesign, and Premiere Pro. Illustrator is widely used by graphic designers, illustrators, and artists to create scalable vector graphics for print and digital media.":"Adobe Illustrator jẹ olootu eya aworan ti o ni idagbasoke ati tita nipasẹ Adobe Inc. O jẹ apakan ti Adobe Creative Cloud suite ti sọfitiwia apẹrẹ, eyiti o pẹlu awọn ohun elo bii Photoshop, InDesign, ati Premiere Pro. ","ADOBE PHOTOSHOP":"ADOBE PHOTOSHOP","Adobe Photoshop is a powerful raster graphics editor developed and published by Adobe Inc. It is widely used by designers, photographers, and artists for image editing, retouching, digital painting, and graphic design. Photoshop is a part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite and is known for its extensive range of features and capabilities.":"Adobe Photoshop jẹ olootu eya aworan raster ti o lagbara ni idagbasoke ati ti a gbejade nipasẹ Adobe Inc. O jẹ lilo pupọ nipasẹ awọn apẹẹrẹ, awọn oluyaworan, ati awọn oṣere fun ṣiṣatunṣe aworan, atunṣe, kikun oni-nọmba, ati apẹrẹ iwọn. ","LINUX":"LINUX","Linux is an open-source, Unix-like operating system kernel that serves as the foundation for a variety of free and open-source operating systems. It was created by Linus Torvalds in 1991 as a hobby project, and it quickly became a popular choice for operating systems due to its stability, security, and flexibility. Linux is known for its use in servers, embedded systems, and as an alternative operating system for personal computers.":"Lainos jẹ orisun-ìmọ, ekuro ẹrọ ṣiṣe bi Unix ti o ṣiṣẹ bi ipilẹ fun ọpọlọpọ awọn ọna ṣiṣe orisun ọfẹ ati ṣiṣi. ","SUBLIME IDE":"GBIGBE IDE","'Sublime Text is a sophisticated and widely used text editor, not an Integrated Development Environment (IDE). It is known for its speed, simplicity, and extensive plugin ecosystem. While Sublime Text provides many features commonly associated with IDEs, it lacks certain integrated tools specific to particular programming languages.":"'Sublime Text jẹ olootu ọrọ ti o ni ilọsiwaju ati lilo pupọ, kii ṣe Ayika Idagbasoke Integrated (IDE). ","NETLIFY":"NETLIFY","Netlify is a cloud platform that provides a range of services for building, deploying, and managing modern web projects. It is particularly known for its simplicity, automation, and integration with popular static site generators and modern web development workflows. Netlify supports both static and serverless (function-as-a-service) architectures, making it a popular choice for web developers and teams.":"Netlify jẹ ipilẹ awọsanma ti o pese ọpọlọpọ awọn iṣẹ fun kikọ, imuṣiṣẹ, ati iṣakoso awọn iṣẹ akanṣe wẹẹbu ode oni. ","TABLEAU":"TABLEAU","Tableau is a powerful data visualization and business intelligence (BI) platform that enables users to connect to, visualize, and share insights from their data. It allows individuals and organizations to create interactive and dynamic dashboards, reports, and visualizations to gain valuable insights into their data.":"Tableau jẹ iworan data ti o lagbara ati ipilẹ oye iṣowo (BI) ti o fun awọn olumulo laaye lati sopọ si, wo oju, ati pin awọn oye lati data wọn. ","VS CODE":"VS CODE","Visual Studio Code (VS Code) is a free and open-source source code editor developed by Microsoft. It is lightweight, highly customizable, and supports a wide range of programming languages and extensions. VS Code is designed to provide developers with a productive environment for coding, debugging, and version control, making it one of the most popular code editors in the developer community.":"Koodu Studio Visual (koodu VS) jẹ ọfẹ ati ṣiṣi orisun koodu olootu koodu ti o dagbasoke nipasẹ Microsoft. ","RAPID MINER":"RAPID MINER","RapidMiner is a data science platform that provides an integrated environment for end-to-end data science and machine learning processes. It allows users to perform tasks such as data preparation, machine learning modeling, and deployment of predictive models. RapidMiner is designed to be user-friendly, making it accessible to a wide range of users, including data scientists, analysts, and business professionals.":"RapidMiner jẹ ipilẹ imọ-jinlẹ data ti o pese agbegbe iṣọpọ fun imọ-jinlẹ data ipari-si-opin ati awọn ilana ikẹkọ ẹrọ. ","Our Features":"Awọn ẹya ara ẹrọ wa","Website Maintenance":"Itọju aaye ayelujara","Web Design, Web Development, Mobile App Design and Mobile App Development":"Apẹrẹ oju opo wẹẹbu, Idagbasoke Oju opo wẹẹbu, Apẹrẹ Ohun elo Alagbeka ati Idagbasoke Ohun elo Alagbeka","AI, ML and Data Science Consultation":"AI, ML ati Data Ijumọsọrọ Imọ","We ensure the websites of our clients' is well maintained as we stay in touch with them":"A rii daju pe awọn oju opo wẹẹbu ti awọn alabara wa 'ti ni itọju daradara bi a ṣe wa ni ifọwọkan pẹlu wọn","We design and develop with cutting edge technologies":"A ṣe apẹrẹ ati idagbasoke pẹlu awọn imọ-ẹrọ gige gige","We provide Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science consultations":"A pese Imọye Oríkĕ, Ẹkọ ẹrọ ati awọn ijumọsọrọ Imọ-jinlẹ Data","Price comparison Table":"Table lafiwe owo","Pricing Built For Businesses Of All Sizes":"Ifowoleri ti a ṣe Fun Awọn iṣowo Ti Gbogbo Awọn iwọn","Before building a website for your business, it is important to know the costs involved. This will ensure you budget adequately for the project. Some business owners think building a website is a one-off thing. You just build it and you go to sleep. However, there are fixed costs and recurrent costs involved in building a business website":"Ṣaaju kikọ oju opo wẹẹbu kan fun iṣowo rẹ, o ṣe pataki lati mọ awọn idiyele ti o kan. ","Features":"Awọn ẹya ara ẹrọ","Basic Plan (Suitable for Budget Applications)":"Eto Ipilẹ (Ti o dara fun Awọn ohun elo Isuna)","Basic Plan (Suitable for Budget Applications) - ₦500,000+":"Eto Ipilẹ (Ti o dara fun Awọn ohun elo Isuna) - ₦ 500,000","Pro Plan (Suitable for Medium to Enterprise Applications)":"Eto Pro (Dara fun Alabọde si Awọn ohun elo Idawọlẹ)","Pro Plan (Suitable for Medium to Enterprise Applications) - ₦1million+":"Eto Pro (Dara fun Alabọde si Awọn ohun elo Idawọlẹ) - ₦ 1million","Integration of Social Media":"Integration ti Social Media","Get found on social media":"Ri lori awujo media","If your site has a login or accepts form submissions, HTTPS is essential for your users’ security and privacy. Google search results prioritize sites with HTTPS enabled":"Ti aaye rẹ ba ni iwọle tabi gba awọn ifisilẹ fọọmu, HTTPS ṣe pataki fun aabo ati aṣiri awọn olumulo rẹ. ","Hosting fee is free":"Owo alejo gbigba jẹ ọfẹ","Would you love to create, manage, and modify content on your website without the need for our specialized technical knowledge":"Ṣe iwọ yoo nifẹ lati ṣẹda, ṣakoso, ati ṣatunṣe akoonu lori oju opo wẹẹbu rẹ laisi iwulo fun imọ-ẹrọ pataki wa","Register a custom address like www.YourBusinessOrName.com to your website or online store":"Forukọsilẹ adirẹsi aṣa bi www.YourBusinessOrName.com si oju opo wẹẹbu rẹ tabi ile itaja ori ayelujara","Netlify build bots do it by parsing your HTML files directly at deploy time, so there’s no need for us to make an API call or include extra JavaScript on your site":"Netlify kọ awọn botilẹnti ṣe nipasẹ sisọ awọn faili HTML rẹ taara ni akoko imuṣiṣẹ, nitorinaa ko si iwulo fun wa lati ṣe ipe API tabi pẹlu afikun JavaScript lori aaye rẹ","Friendly Forkhive Guides are standing by to answer your questions. Call +234 913 863 6045":"Awọn Itọsọna Forkhive Ọrẹ ti duro lati dahun awọn ibeere rẹ. ","You can book one-time, recurring appointments, a webinar, class, workshop, in-person or virtual event directly from your website and Remind customers of their upcoming bookings":"O le ṣe iwe-akoko kan, awọn ipinnu lati pade loorekoore, webinar kan, kilasi, idanileko, eniyan tabi iṣẹlẹ foju taara lati oju opo wẹẹbu rẹ ki o leti awọn alabara ti awọn iwe ifipamọ wọn ti n bọ","Accept credit card, Paystack, Flutterwave, Interswitch Webpay, Paypal, Amplify and Remita payments for products/orders. Transaction fees are dependent on your selected payment processor. We don’t charge additional fees and, with Paystack, offer one of the lowest transaction fees (Local Cards: 1.5% + 100NGN, International Cards: 3.9% + NGN, 100 NGN 100 fee is waived for transactions less than NGN 2500) compared to similar ecommerce plans":"Gba kaadi kirẹditi, Paystack, Flutterwave, Interswitch Webpay, Paypal, Amplify ati Remita owo sisan fun awọn ọja/ibere. ","Does your website require database integration let us know":"Ṣe oju opo wẹẹbu rẹ nilo isọpọ data data jẹ ki a mọ","If someone loads pages of your site on multiple different days, they will be counted as a unique visitor for each day. If someone loads pages of your site during multiple different hours, they will  be counted as a unique visitor for each hour. You could be watching  this metric":"Ti ẹnikan ba ṣajọ awọn oju-iwe ti aaye rẹ ni ọpọlọpọ awọn ọjọ oriṣiriṣi, wọn yoo ka wọn bi alejo alailẹgbẹ fun ọjọ kọọkan. ","Get found on Google and other search engines with help Gatsby or Netlify":"Wa lori Google ati awọn ẹrọ wiwa miiran pẹlu iranlọwọ Gatsby tabi Netlify","₦500,000+":"₦500,000","in addition to":"ni afikun si","recurrent costs":"loorekoore owo","Note":"Akiyesi","Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market":"Awọn idiyele jẹ koko-ọrọ si idiju ti iṣẹ akanṣe ati iseda ti ọja naa","₦1million":"₦1million","Hire Us":"Bẹwẹ Wa","SSL/TLS Certificate":"Iwe-ẹri SSL/TLS","Hosting Fee":"Owo alejo gbigba","CMS (Content Management System)":"CMS (Eto Isakoso akoonu)","Custom Domain Registration":"Iforukọsilẹ Aṣa Aṣa","Form Submission":"Ifisilẹ fọọmu","24/7 Support":"24/7 atilẹyin","Online Appointments and Reminders (Business Working hours)":"Awọn ipinnu lati pade lori Ayelujara ati awọn olurannileti (Awọn wakati Ṣiṣẹ Iṣowo)","Mon-Fri":"Mon-jimọọ","Mon-Sun":"Mon-Sun","Ecommerce Functionality":"Iṣẹ-ṣiṣe Ecommerce","Database Integration":"Data Integration","Guidance and Analytics":"Itọsọna ati atupale","Search Engine Optimization (SEO)":"Imudara Ẹrọ Iwadi (SEO)","Price Range":"Ibiti idiyele","₦500,000+ in addition to recurrent costs (Note: Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market)":"₦500,000 ni afikun si awọn idiyele loorekoore (Akiyesi: Awọn idiyele jẹ koko-ọrọ si idiju ti iṣẹ akanṣe ati iseda ti ọja naa)","₦1million+ in addition to recurrent costs (Note: Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market)":"₦1million ni afikun si awọn idiyele loorekoore (Akiyesi: Awọn idiyele jẹ koko-ọrọ si
